abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column recounts story of Mandy Hicks and Andy Partridge, tourists from North Yorkshire, England, who got engaged while watching bald eagles on Hudson River.
lead_paragraph: More than once, Andy Partridge set his mind to proposing to his childhood friend Mandy Hicks, but the moment was always ruined by other couples — until the pair went on an eagle watch in Upper Manhattan.

headline.main: With Eagles Sighted, a Proposal Takes Flight
headline.print_headline: With Eagles Sighted, a Proposal Takes Flight

snippet: More than once, Andy Partridge set his mind to proposing to his childhood friend Mandy Hicks, but the moment was always ruined by other couples — until the pair went on an eagle watch in Upper Manhattan.
